scripts.microbundle-start: microbundle src/index.ts --compress false -o ./dist -f modern --target web --raw true  --tsconfig tsconfig.json
scripts.microbundle-start-opt: microbundle src/index.ts -o ./dist -f modern,umd --target web --raw true  --tsconfig tsconfig.json
scripts.dev: microbundle watch src/index.ts -o ./dist -f modern --raw  true --target web --tsconfig tsconfig.json
scripts.output: npm run microbundle-start && npm run postbuild
